org.modelio.metamodel.experts.links

Class LinkTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.metamodel.experts.links.LinkTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICompoundExpert, ILinkExpert, ILinkManipulator, ILinkMdaExpert, ILinkTool

    public class LinkTool
extends Object
implements ILinkTool
    Link experts and manipulation tools.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LinkTool.LinkExpertRegistry
      Registry to get the expert for a given: parent element metaclass. link metaclass. stereotype. mobject Custom experts must implements ILinkExpert and be registered in the initialize() method.
